home.title: Private AI Insights for Your Blood Test Results
home.subtitle: Upload your blood diagnostics and receive secure, private explanations powered by medical-grade AI.
home.nearPowered: Private Inference powered by NEAR AI
home.beginWizard: Begin the wizard with a quick upload. Nothing is sent to a server.
home.howItWorksDesc: Designed for clarity and privacy at every step, from upload to understanding.
home.step1Body: Securely upload your blood test PDF or image.
home.step2Body: AI analyzes results without storing or sharing raw data.
home.step3Body: Understand markers, risks, and recommended actions.
home.privacyDesc: Veridoc applies zero-knowledge inference principles so your raw diagnostics stay in your control. We do not resell data, and we do not train models on your personal medical records.
home.dataControl: Your data never leaves your control
home.dataControlBody: Processing is designed around privacy-first handling and encrypted flows.
home.inferenceBody: Only insights are returned, never raw diagnostics.
home.whatYouLearnDesc: Receive clear explanations of common biomarkers and what they mean for your health decisions.
home.learn4: Red flags that require medical attention
home.disclaimer: Veridoc does not replace professional medical advice.
home.trust1: Designed with medical privacy in mind
home.trust3: Audits and certifications available upon request
home.ctaSubtitle: Private AI explanations, clear next steps, and complete control of your diagnostics.
home.footer: Veridoc is designed to support informed discussions with your clinician.
